name: dns-server
description: A Demo of the npm udpmesh package

scripts.test: node node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=lcov --exclude=spec node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.gendocs: node node_modules/jsdoc/jsdoc.js lib lib/jsdoc README.md -c .jsdoc.js -d docs

author: Tom Cully
